basics.name: Artem Skripka
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: At each project i've communicated directly with product owner. Worked with both agile and waterfall.

work.summary: Working at LearnTrials project - an edTech startup helping to expand equitable access for all students to education technology that works.
highlights: Rewrite parts of legacy angular frontend into new shiny react during implementation of new features.
Implement new features for RoR backend / react frontend.

work.summary: GridHub is a renewable energy business platform helping clients showcase their portfolio and expertise. I've worked as fullstack engineer, helped to build application infrastructure.
highlights: I learned to stop worrying and love the tests
Helped to make a step out of typical RailsWay and use Trailblazer and Dry-stack in production

work.summary: Company focused on partnership with building companies, helping them get more control at their business processes with a help of ERP systems based on products of 1C company. I've participated in 4 integration projects lasting from 4 to 13 months.
highlights: Wrote several instructions for ERP system
Teached dozens of customer's employees to work in new business processes
Was a lead for one develoer and one consultant during ERP integration
Made a platform for internal use based on both 1C Document Management and 1C ITIL
